QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, inv_hierarchies.id odf_pk, odf_ca_investmentallocation.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, inv_hierarchies.DEFAULT_ALLOC_PCT as default_alloc_pct, inv_hierarchies.CHILD_ID as child_id, inv_hierarchies.PARENT_ID as parent_id, inv_investments.odf_object_code as investment_type_code, odf_ca_investmentallocation.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_investmentallocation.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_investmentallocation.partition_code as partition_code, inv_investments.status as status, odf_ca_investmentallocation.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from inv_hierarchies inv_hierarchies JOIN odf_ca_inv odf_ca_inv ON odf_ca_inv.id=inv_hierarchies.parent_id JOIN inv_investments inv_investments ON inv_investments.id=inv_hierarchies.parent_id JOIN odf_ca_investmentallocation odf_ca_investmentallocation ON odf_ca_investmentallocation.id=inv_hierarchies.id where 1 = 1
